summary: REQ-65 appears implemented in AccessDeniedScreen with explicit "Web control" unsupported messaging and guidance to request Security/ICP Controller access while preserving Principal ID copy. REQ-64 cannot be confirmed from the provided diff excerpts; the Roles & Access panel changes shown do not include the required "Web control" copy, and the file summary does not mention it. Additionally, AccessDeniedScreen includes embedded ICP panels not requested by the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update Roles & Access panel copy to explicitly clarify that "Web control" / "World Wide Web Controller" is not supported, state only App Controller/Security/ICP Controller exist, and instruct users to share Principal ID with App Controller to request Security or ICP Controller.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff excerpt for RolesAccessPanel.tsx does not show any of the required "Web control" / "World Wide Web Controller" guidance text, and the frontend file summary for RolesAccessPanel is truncated without mentioning the new copy. Because the relevant section may be outside the truncated portion, implementation cannot be verified from the provided evidence.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (RolesAccessPanel not described as containing Web control guidance)

hallucinated_features.description: Embedded ICP Connection Status and ICP Controls panels added to the Access Denied screen.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for copy/UX guidance updates on Roles & Access and Access Denied screens regarding the unsupported "Web control" role; adding ICP panels is outside the requested scope.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (AccessDeniedScreen described as embedding ICP panels)
